install.name: Ulti Polaroid
install.author: Ulti Joomla
install.description:
Makes a polaroid of your images image.

Usage: Put the image you where you want the effect between the polaroid tag. The default tag is {polaroid}, but this can be adjusted in the backend. The path is the relative path from the images folder.

Example: {polaroid param="value"}stories/logo.jpg{/polaroid}.

Supported parameters are: alt, title, width, height, rotation, bordercolor, borderwidth, shadowcolor and shadowopacity.

Backend parameters:
Tag: The tag you use for images where you want the effect (default=polaroid).

Check the plugin website for support: Ulti Joomla

param.name: tag
param.label: Tag
param.description: The tag you use for images where you want the polaroid effect
